CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 3, 1953, pg. 15, reads: "'Pete' Santa Claus - Just before they were all gone, Milferd (Pete) Jackson, special representative of the United Steel Workers, got in on the eighty Christmas food packages given away by the Frontiers Club to needy families all over the city. Mr. Jackson was one of the Frontiersmen who played Santa Claus Christmas Eve. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Milferd "Pete" Jackson holding bag in front of table with bags and boxes of food, for Frontiers Club Christmas food drive, in Wesley Center AME Zion Church
